message.content: Yes, the authors provide a URL (https://serre-lab.github.io/Harmonization/) for their codebase that can be used to incorporate the neural harmonizer into any DNN and measure its alignment with humans on the datasets described in the paper.

Yes, the authors provide a URL to their codebase (https://serre-lab.github.io/Harmonization/) which can be used to incorporate the neural harmonizer into any DNN and measure its alignment with humans on the datasets they describe in the paper.
